name: Web Accessibility By accessiBe
author: accessiBe

sections.description:
Accessible, automatic, and affordable: Make your website accessible

accessiBe is the market leader in web accessibility solutions and services.

Our AI-powered solution, accessWidget, maintains ADA and WCAG compliance and enhances the usability of any website. It could boost your brand perception, reach new customers by opening your website to 15% of the world‚Äôs population with a disability, and is trusted to mitigate legal risk for tens of thousands of businesses and industry leaders alike.

accessiBe‚Äôs free WordPress plugin helps connect to our solution for simpler installation and configuration. The accessiBe plugin for WordPress also helps to seamlessly connect to accessiBe‚Äôs AI solution without the need to touch code.

Try the leading WordPress accessibility solution today with a 7-day free trial; no credit card required. Read the accessiBe reviews and visit https://accessibe.com to learn more.

How accessiBe‚Äôs solution can help you help your customers

Open your website to the world!

Navigating the internet is a daily challenge for 15% of the world‚Äôs population. That‚Äôs the percentage of people with disabilities in the world today, and they experience limitations when navigating your website. accessiBe‚Äôs solution coupled with our WordPress accessibility plugin enables a wide array of people with disabilities to use your website effectively, boosting your market reach.

To make websites accessible, accessWidget service utilizes two applications that run together. The AI-powered background process handles optimizations for the more complex requirements like screen-reader and keyboard navigation adjustments, while the accessibility interface handles UI and design-related adjustments.

How the AI-Powered process works:

Using contextual understanding and image recognition, accessWidget‚Äôs AI scans and analyzes websites to learn what elements and functionality they include, adjusting them to your users‚Äô screen-readers. Automatic screen-reader adjustments include:
– Alt Tags
– State Controls
– ARIA Attributes
– Icons & Buttons
– Roles & Landmarks
– Forms & Validations

accessWidget‚Äôs AI learns and understands the structures and behaviors of your website‚Äôs elements on-the-fly, adding keyboard-only functionality to each of them. Automatic keyboard navigation adjustments include:
– Dropdowns
– Menus
– Popups
– Forms
– Skip Links
– Buttons

An accessibility interface for customized accessibility
accessWidget‚Äôs interface provides an optimal online experience tailored to every user‚Äôs individual needs. There‚Äôs a range of seamless customization options that support multiple UI and design adjustments from content to display and more.

‚ÄúWhen a website is with accessiBe, I can easily read whatever I want or access and buy whatever I need with no problem whatsoever.‚Äù
Sisi, Blind User

‚ÄúMany of our clients were being hit with frivolous lawsuits. accessiBe solved many of these.‚Äù
Joe P, G2 Crowd

How does accessiBe work? Automatically

After installing the accessiBe plugin and registering for an account on our site (service), you‚Äôll automatically enable around-the-clock, 24/7 compliance. accessWidget‚Äôs AI technology automatically scans for new and revised content every 24 hours.

‚ÄúaccessiBe is an exceptional solution that helps our clients drive more revenue and achieve compliance with minimum costs and efforts.‚Äù
Tara, Director of Client Services at SellSide Media

Developed Side-By-Side with People with Disabilities

accessWidget‚Äôs first stable version took 18 months of daily development to collaborate with people with disabilities that continue today. Blind people, motor and visually impaired people, people with epilepsy, and others are vital parts of our research & development.

‚ÄúDeveloping accessiBe side-by-side with the people who are using it daily is the secret sauce to our success.‚Äù
Shir Ekerling, accessiBe CEO.
sections.faq:
Does accessiBe adhere to WCAG?

Yes! accessiBe‚Äôs solution adheres to the WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) version 2.1 at the AA level success criteria, and level AAA in certain areas, the highest WCAG level.

Can I use the accessiBe solution without using the accessiBe plugin?

Yes, that‚Äôs possible although we don‚Äôt recommend it. By using just our service your site‚Äôs accessibility will improve but you‚Äôll have to manually add our JS code to your theme and configure it. So why mess with code if you can install our plugin üòâ

Can I use the accessiBe plugin without using the accessiBe solution?

Sorry, no. That‚Äôs not possible. Our AI service (SaaS) does the ‚Äúheavy lifting‚Äù. The accessiBe plugin helps connect to our service and helps you configure it so you don‚Äôt have to modify any theme files and mess with code.

What website platforms does the accessiBe solution support?

With accessiBe, you‚Äôre not just limited to WordPress accessibility. accessiBe is platform agnostic and can be integrated into any CMS and website building platform! To mention a few: Joomla, Squarespace Shopify, WiX, BigCommerce, Volusion, Magento, Concrete 5, Weebly, and more.

How much does accessWidget cost?

We aim to enable complete web and WordPress accessibility for everyone on the internet. accessWidget starts from $49 a month.

Does the accessiBe plugin or solution affect loading speed?

Absolutely not! accessWidget loads asynchronously with your website. Meaning, that the browser loads your website in parallel with accessWidget, and does not wait for it to load or process anything.

Are the accessiBe plugin and solution GDPR & CCPA compliant?

Yes, the accessiBe plugin is GDPR & CCPA compliant as it does not collect any data from the visitors. The accessiBe solution complies with all major data protection regulations, including GDPR and CCPA. Moreover, accessWidget does not collect any personal or identifiable data, only structure, and behavior. Please refer to our privacy policy for more information.

Can I customize accessWidget‚Äôs design?

Yes! accessWidget is fully customizable and can easily match your website‚Äôs design. You can choose your preferred color pallets, positions, icons, sizing, and even the accessibility button placement. All that can be achieved from the plugin.
